content.detailedDescription:
We (my dad and i) were headed west on i694 at late dusk and noticed it moving from the south of i694, first east, then north. first cigar-shaped, with white-amber lights, one very bright white (spot)light in center. moved and changed direction very freely-unlike any aircraft we could think of. ther were a few commercial aircraft in the area, but they were noticed only because the ufo moved so much more quick and agile, which is what finally convinced my dad. would've had much time for photos, but no camera on hand.

we lost immediate sight of it as it passed over and behind our view from the car, but then reappeared as a collection of all red lights in a triangular pattern moving to match car speed, then much faster into distance, took a hard left (south) and left from view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First cigar-shaped, with whitelights, then triangular collection of red lights

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on rt 89 n toward erie pa to get on rt 90 going w.
i looked up at the sky, dusk, still bright, sun was just setting, sky was light and noticed the golden tails, not like vapor trails from airplanes.
i immediately thought is wasn't earth made planes.
i pulled off the road and watched, they were high in the sky the tail looked attached, didn't float away, and they seemed to be going at different angles to each other, so they couldn't be planes or they would run into each other in the sky.
i knew i was seeing something special. i got back on the highway after calling my sister and reporting what i was seeing and felt blessed to be a part of the sighting.  one then was in front of me on the road high in the sky, saw the blinking light.  i just kept driving until i lost sight of them.  about 15 minutes later i called 911 they took my cell number and said they would call back if anyone else called in noone ever called me back.
content.summary: 5 or 6 high in sky black dots, with flashing light and golden tails overhead sort of north east as i was driving toward erie, pa to get on rt 90 going west. i had just entered rt. 89 n.

content.detailedDescription: When i was out in my backyard on july 7th 2005 on a friday night at 9:40 p.M. i saw a ufo in the sky. it was round at the top and was wide at the top and got narrower going toward the bottom it was yellow lighted with orange vertical lines all around it and it had a red light on the top and on the bottom. it was really scary and it was coming towards me. it thought it might abduct me.
content.summary: While i was out in my backyard i saw 3 weird scary object

content.detailedDescription:
1. see above 
2. see above
3. a fusealoge of an airplane without a tale or nose but with lighted windows. it was bright aluminum (but realised later it was a moonlight night & there was no sun which made no sence).It seemed to bank slightly like when making a left gradual turn.
4. see above
5. to much to discribe here.
6. moved behind trees to left.
content.summary: Moving balance of items from campground home & while returning to shed i seen this thing moving rt. to lt. between trees.

content.detailedDescription:
It was tuesday, september 13, 2005.  i had gotten off work and gone home to check some work that a friend of mine, john darley, had done on our farm.  he had cleared about an acre of land to build a shop on.  after checking the work, i decided to ride over to his house to pay him for the work. 

i saw john and his helper, leon, coming down the road (leon joiner road) in john's truck.  he saw me and we stopped to talk at a pond across from leon's house.  it was beginning to be dusk.  it was between 7 and 8 pm.

i pulled over and parked and we (leon and i) were standing beside john's truck talking. i noticed an orange, pinkish object over leon's shoulder that caught my attention.  at first, i did not think anything about it.  then another object appeared and another, instantly.  the objects were all at the same elevation and equal distances apart, but definitely not part of the same craft.

then, as quickly as they appeared, the objects were gone.  in about 15 seconds, the objects appeared again.  this time, they were closer to us. 

i saw the outline of a round object in the sky.  i could see one light, or something glowing, at the perimeter of the object.  then there were two lights, then three lights, then four, five and six.  the object was slowly rotating and as it rotated, more lights came into view.  

another object appeared next to this one.  the objects were very close together.  john remarked "those two air planes are about to collide."  this object rotated to reveal four "lights". 

the objects were stationary in the sky. there was no sound associated with the sighting.

then as quickly as they appeared, the lights and objects were gone. 

we stood their talking and decided what we had seen was no air plane or helicopter.  

a few minutes later these objects reappeared half way across the sky from the second sighting.  there were three points of light.  first one appeared, then the second some distance behind, then the third some distance behind.  they were all at the same elevation in the sky and in perfect alignment.  the objects moved some distance across the sky and stopped.

as quickly as they appeared, they were gone again.  

we waited about another 30 minutes or so and discussed what we saw.  we then went home.
content.summary: Saw 4 lights in sky at a distance, which moved closer to reveal round object

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i were sitting on front porch  saw two difused lights moving slowly very apart then realised they were from one object  thought lights were from helicopters
then it made a sharp turn suddenly about 200 ft of the craft lit up with disco type lights  lights were red orange blue green to yellow white  looked like electronic exhaust
it then accelerated to about 100 mph same altitude about 600 ft off the ground disappeared over the lights of hesperia heading towards inter state 15 jim mcguire
content.summary: Dark colored craft about 400 ft long  speed about 20 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was about 14 years old at the time and was riding in the back seat of my parents car as we returned home one evening around 8:30pm. an avid stargazer as a boy i always had a habit of checking out the sky at night. that night we were on fairfax drive (in the hilly section of town) and as usual i had looked up in the sky to see the stars. i immediantly noticed two bright orange objects high in the sky above our car. at first i thought they were stars but the orange color gave them away. i alerted my dad who was at the wheel and he pulled over and my dad and mom and i got out to look closer. the objects did appear very high, silent, and positioned side by side not moving at all. after a few minutes the object on the right started moving slowly away from the other and then just appeared to go dark and dissapeared. the remaining object was motionless for 15 seconds or less and then just like someone turning a light switch off, just went dark without appearing to move at all and disappeared. we drove on home (next street over) and i remember my parents discussing the incident, wondering just what we had seen. i called the local branch of the weather service(just in case) and ask them if there were any weather baloons in the area that night. they said there were none and proceeded to take my report asking me specific questions as to altitude and other aspects of my sighting.
content.summary: Returning home with my parents i noticed two bright orange objects high above the street we were on.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself were sitting on our swing out in the front yard talking and looking up. when we both see these green neon lights in a circular shape travling from the ese to the wnw direction. this object was tipping from the left to the right as it moved across the sky making no noise whatsoever. i thought it might have been a plane, but had no sound, no blinking lights and i have never seen a round shape plane before. no helicopter. i asked my wife do you see what i see --she said yes. i asked her to describe what you see it was the samething i'm seeing. now when i said it moved tipping left to right it wasn't a drastic move but you could see that it was tipping because the lights would black out on the otherside as the side lifted up. all i kept saying is " do you see what i see" to my wife and kept saying yes. i have never ever seen anything like this before in my life. i watched the object move to the wnw moving sightly up and down from a distance. then i lost the object due to the trees and terrain. the object was not spinning . there was no sound, no heat distubance behind the object against the stars.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling east on ca state route 20 towards yuba city, ca i stopped my vehicle on ca state route 20 to take two pictures of an unusual geological formation known as the sutter buttes. i used a canon canon sure shot  a 75 camera set on landscape mode.  the two pictures were taken not more than 20 seconds apart. i was about  3-5 miles from the object (estimated).

i did not notice the object at the time i took the phtograph, but later than evening when i downloaded them into my canon zoom browserphoto software and enlarged both pictures i noticed the object. i also noticed a second object hovering above the buttes  almost at the top of the picture frame perhaps 1-3000 feet above gro8nd???. (see 1st ufo picture)  in the second shot they are both gone. it was in the first shot but not in the second one.

the object in the first shot is long, rectangular-oblong , very dark, appears black in the photo,it appeared to be on a upward trajectory.  (see photo for details).  i didnot see it move..It may have been traveling at phenomenal speed.

i have not touched my camera since last night..It is in its case.
content.summary: I stopped my car to take a picture of the sutter butte, i took one digital shot followed by a second one 20 seconds later, i notice the object when i enlarged shot.

content.detailedDescription: After watching the stanley cup finals with my father we headed upstairs to call it a night. as we turned off the kitchen light my father and i noticed a round glowing white light deep in the woods (maybe about 200 feet away). it appeared to be on ground level through the trees. at first we assumed it was a reflection off our microwave clock but then it started to move. it appeared to rise slowly into the the air then took off into the sky. my father and i kept watching but whatever it was it didn't return. knowing that i was only 13 at the time and scared of the unknown my father just told me it was a car in the distance. recently i brought up the story to my father and he openly admitted that he never knew what the hell the thing was. since there wasn't a road behind the house at the time (today a housing development named peppermint ridge is built on the property) the only other explanation i could think of was ball lighting. two years prior on thanksgiving we had a ball of lighting come through our backyard and strike our neighbor's chimney setting their house on fire... but seeing how it was early june and the object was much bigger than the ball lighting i saw then i can say i have no idea what the thing was.
content.summary: Bright flying object hovering in woods in old lyme

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with a friend on the 210 freeway, heading west, when all of a sudden we saw a very bright white light in the sky above us shoot through at a very high speed.  it was like a shooting star, but too bright and too low, and all of a sudden it stopped and faded in its luminosity, looking like a normal plane light, but it didn't seem to move like one.  it stayed in the sky and seemed to travel slowly north.
content.summary: Very white bright light like shooting star sped, then stopped in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with a friend on the 210 freeway, heading west, when all of a sudden we saw a very bright white light in the sky above us shoot through at a very high speed.  it was like a shooting star, but too bright and too low, and all of a sudden it stopped and faded in its luminosity, looking like a normal plane light, but it didn't seem to move like one.  it stayed in the sky and seemed to travel slowly north.
content.summary: Very white bright light like shooting star sped, then stopped in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in a friends house outside belleville when a red flash of light lit up the room for a few seconds. my friends and i went outside to see what was out there. thats when we seen a triangular object with a green lights shoot out of the trees and make a hard 90 degree turn and a second red triangular object followed it up into the sky til we couldnt see it anymore. my cousin and i took pictures which r gone. we have no record of them anywhere. this is weird to us and we wanted to know if you guys have heard of this too. my cousin took pictures of it landing on the road he was on. they walked up to it and thats when it shot up into the sky and my friends and i witnessed it. he stored them on his laptop computer in his hard drive and also saved them on his camera. these pictures are all gone. he said it looked like a military craft. it had a cockpit with lights inside. it was silent no noise at all. he wants to remain anonymous too.
content.summary: Triangular craft shot up out of the trees down the road from a friends house then made a hard 90 degree turn and shot up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the living room and had just raised the shades of the west of the house.  as i sat watching tv i noticed this object out of the corner of my eye.  i got up and walked to the window and watched a few seconds, turned away and walked across the room to get a pair of binoculers but when i looked at the object, i could not make out any more details. never saw anything like it but first described it as a bullet shape and someone just told me: cylinder.  i hesitated in reporting it but i'm wondering if anyone else saw it....Like west of the mountains.
content.summary: Large cylinder shaped white, firey object from south to west traveling fast and disappearing behind high dark rain clouds

content.detailedDescription:
>>1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was with my wife and son playing in our apartment playground, swinging on the swings.

>>2. what made you first notice the object?

my son enjoys spotting airplanes/helicopters in the sky.  i noticed a jet in the distance to the northeast and pointed it out to him.  i scanned the skies for additional planes, then noticed a small point to the southeast that looked like a strong reflective glint.

i focused on it a bit more (i was in motion on the swing, but stopped after a few seconds), then noticed that the bright point had several (6-8) similarly small points arranged around it in an irregular pattern.  the surrounding point objects were not as bright/reflective.

>>3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

truly did not know what it could be - perhaps some kind of large high-altitude balloon.  but i could not reconcile why several other point objects would be around the bright point.  they were not moving like a flock of birds and i did not think they were a group of consumer balloons (e.G. reflective mylar novelty balloons)

>>4. describe the object and its actions.

in addition to what i described above, i returned to swinging on the swings since my son was insisting noisily that i resume our family activities.  while swinging and watching the object group, i noticed one of the peripheral objects move in a horizontal, straight line -- it did not appear to leave the basic perimeter area of the arrangement.  i looked away for a few moments, then looked up and saw the overall group was slowly heading south and disappearing behind a tree in my view.

>>5. describe your reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i was very puzzled, trying to figure out a rational explanation for the objects.  i observed several jet airliners flying in the general vicinity and they seemed to clearly be at a lower altitude than these point objects.

i asked my wife to confirm she could see the objects too and she did.  they have been on my mind for hours after the event! :-)

>>6. how did you lose sight of the object?

as noted, when i looked for the group they seemed to be moving lower in the horizon (due south) to the point of being obscured by a tree and apartment roofline.  i lost sight completely after about 5 minutes and did not attempt to gain a clearer view from a different location.
content.summary: Grouping of tiny white/silver objects

content.detailedDescription: My mom saw it first and asked me what it was. we were standing on our porch looking northwest. it was behing trees when i went outside. it slowly appeared from behind the trees moving toward the west. there was no noise at all. our guess is it was about 300 ft. above us going about the same speed as a small airplane.  the object just flew out of sight behind more trees and about 45 sec. later an airplane headed from the west toward where we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Large disk moving slowly, very low and quiet

content.detailedDescription: While out camping with our boy scout troop in the tinley park area, we noticed a bright red light suddenly appear about 35-40 degrees above the horizon in the sw sky. the light was brighter than any star in the sky and was brilliant red like fireworks, not a dull red like mars or betelgeuse. i assumed it was an aircraft that i hadn't noticed approaching, but it remained stationary for more than 5 minutes. some of the scouts thought it might be a flare because it was so brilliant. but it didn't move at all! it apppeared to flash brighter on occasion, but this might be due to the hazy conditions. the light then slowly moved to the southeast in relation to the backgound stars covering about 10-15 degrees of arc, then slowly moved to northwest after another 5 minutes or so, covering the same 10-15 degrees of arc. the red light then changed direction and moved more quickly to the north and straight overhead us. as the sky was hazy we lost it overhead (behind the clouds? or faded away?). we searched the skies overhead for the next hour or so but could not locate it again. what was this?!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant red light appears and moves across  sky

content.detailedDescription:
I hope this is the right place to post this sort of sighting as it is not a ufo in the sense that we know of it but is a phenomena that is not clearly identified or understood.

after picking up my daughter at 9/10/2005, 11:12pm from work, we had arrived home at 11:15pm - 11:20pm.  we proceeded to walk into the house but was startled by a faintly green haze (we live in a highly polluted light area surrounded by portland / beaverton / hillsboro) spanning from northwest to northeast.  i suddenly called out my oldest daughter to come and see the awesome sight. so, there are 3 witnesses that viewed the phenomena. continuing with the "light show", it appeared to get brighter and then it dimmed and disappeared.  it suddenly appeared again in the east as a spherical shape (like a fog haze but visually noticable) then dimming a disappearing.  then about a minute later, appears again spanning nw to ne.  the whole affair lasted 15-20 minutes and did not appear for at least 30 minutes before we gave up and went back into the house.

note: the light is green.  no other colors of the light spectrum appears.  the phenomena as it appeared did not seem to be an 'aurora borealis' which is why i am reporting it here.
content.summary: Not a ufo, but aurora borealis?  haarp maybe?

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after a thunder storm i went outside to the dock area to work. i happened to look west and saw what appeared to be a black ballon rising stright up from the ground.     i could not tell how far away it was but guessed a quarter mile at most. as i worked putting labels on some drums i would keep looking at it to see where it was going. it was heading due east toward me. after several minutes i stopped working and just watch it. when it got closer i noticed that unlike a ballon there was no air inlet that i could see and it was perfectly round and the color was unusal as it looked blackest and dull gray.                          i had read that aliens use esp to transmit thoughts and i had made up my mind if i ever had the opportunity i would try that. as the object got overhead i stared at it and thought this  ' if this is a ufo show me a sign "  at the exact time i thought this it turned over and it was really  shaped like an old straw hat. flat on the top with a thin body.   i watched the object until it went over the building i was working next to and i couldn't see it anymore. i ran thru the building which was about 150 feet to the other dock door and then outside but could not locate it anywhere.    this object had to be on edge when i first saw it and had to be slowly turning as it appeared round all the while i was watching it until it made that final turn when i could tell the real shape. i had a strange feeling that someone was watching during this whole encounter.
content.summary: Spotted black object rising up from the west.

content.detailedDescription: I am waiting for my friend to wake up.  it dark and i see round flat shape and it glow.  i can not hear it. i try to take a pic and it did not show it on the pic.  so it ufo is moving up and down fast and i think ummm that is ufo.  and went straight up in the space.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The ufo moving up and down and fly up the space

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking witha friend to get something to eat at a local restaurant.
2. their brightnes and that it was the only bright thing in the sky.
3.We thought they were helicopters.
4.They were two bright yelowish objects moving around really close to each other then they disappeared.
5.We were excited and surprised because we've never seen such thing.
6.The lights faded away one by one.
content.summary: Two bright lights shining really bright througgh the fog, moving around

content.detailedDescription:
Was just arriving home from work(audio engineer)and looking up to check seeing conditions(amateur astronomer)when object described emerged over church building across the street from my apartment. it flew slowly, almost majestically, as though it was on a track, curving over my apartment building(223 13th st.), continuing its 180 degree curve till it straightened out over 4th avenue, the nearest intersection. i walked down 13th st. to 4th ave. to keep it in sight, and watched it fly straight south on 4th ave for a long way until it curved again out of sight over intervening buildings. as it flew away i could see it was quite thin compared to width and length.
this happened in early evening and there was enough light for object to be sharply silhouetted. could not see any markings or exhaust. there was also no sound. there were two crosswise narrow bands of pulsating orange light on the underside, fore and aft.
this thing struck me as very unusual from the first instant i saw it. i tried to attract attention of bystanders but this is difficult in new york city. there was no time to get a camera.
content.summary: Dark rectangle approx 30x7x1,w/2 pulsating orange light bands underside; no sound or exhaust; flew curving track; 50-500 feet long?

content.detailedDescription: Cfr, nsa, trilateralists, usn, nasa. grey/reptilian/ saurian masters, u n, project blue book
content.summary: Majestic 12,  skull&bones,  illuminati,  bilderbergers, rothschilds

content.detailedDescription: Cfr, nsa, trilateralists, usn, nasa. grey/reptilian/ saurian masters, u n
content.summary: Majestic 12,  skull&bones,  illuminati,  bilderbergers, rothschilds

content.detailedDescription:
My friend, joanne capo, and i were driving down bailey road (off w. henrietta road) when we were approaching a stop light at the corner of river road. because i was looking "up" for the light to change just to my left was a
silver cigar-shaped object that appeared to be "hovering" above some trees, appox. 100 ft. above and to my left. it was below all the clouds. i told my friend to look to the left and she responded "oh my god barb, that's a ufo". there was no traffic at that time so we slowed down to a stop and watched it hover for about 15 seconds - it would have made an excellent picture if i had brought a camera along. there appeared to be no lights (although it was daytime). it suddenly moved upward into the clouds and was gone. 

i had a unique sighting experience in 1969 with my father also. it was in the town of churchville ny, west of rochester. this one was more saucer-shaped and hovered just above the trees at churchville park.We watched it for a long time and even followed it westward until we were on a road that we did not recognize - it was about 60 miles from the park. my late father told me to never talk about it to anyone - so i didn't until recently. 

also, in the year 2000, i was bothered by my right eye hurting as if something was lodged in it. i went to an eye doctor who told me there were two pieces of metal, identically shaped, that looked "strategically" placed on each side of my cornea. he asked me if i ever had eye surgery and i said, "no, i sure haven't". the doctor actually drew a diagram of my eye for me at the time. he sent me then (immediately) to an eye surgeon who removed these "unusual" pieces of metal from the sides of my cornea. he said "those pieces of metal are identically shaped and placed and they just didn't blow into your eye".
i tried to locate the the doctor about 3 months later and his office was vacated. i don't remember the name of the actual surgeon he sent me to, but at that time i did a search for him (after thinking about the fact that he removed those pieces that i prob. should have been given) and came up with nothing - nowhere in the ama or anywhere was he listed so i was out of luck.

thank you for listening; i am very tired of "secrets". we all know they're out there and it's time it was proven. i only hope i live long enough to experience the revelation.

thanks so much,
barb nichols
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed a "pearly silver" cigar-shaped ufo.

My friend, joanne capo, and i were returning from a breakfast outing and were driving down bailey road, off w. henrietta road, (which backs up to the rochester institute of technology).  i noticed it first; a "pearly silver" bullet-shaped object to the

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with 3 of my friends (raoel, sammy & george) in george's frontyard, when i heard a very loud airplane approaching. i started to look up at the sunny clear blue sky to see where the plane was and a few seconds later, sure enough a regular plane (with a grey bottom with white letters that said a d) flew over the back to the front of the house at a very low altitude. the house is about fifteen minutes from bush intercontinental airport, so the low flying plane wasn't unusual but the plane was flying a lot lower than average. right after the plane flew over us, my eyes were still looking up at the sky, and i noticed what i thought was a "brilliant white star". right away i told my friends to check it out, so now we all were looking at the sky. it seemed unusual because of how bright it was for the daytime. at this moment it was directly on top of us where the plane had flown over us, but this "brilliant white star" i would estimate was atleast double the cruising altitude of regular commercial airplanes. a second or two after telling my friends to lookup at the "brilliant white star" the "brilliant white star," we realized was moving! not only was it moving but after my eyes focused in i noticed two more crafts! right then i asked everyone else if they saw the additional crafts, they acknowledge they saw them too. the "briliant white craft" was in the back of the v formation, to its left & front was a dimmer "blue craft" and to its right front was a "red craft." all of us saw the "brilliant white craft" and "red craft" but the my last friend to look up (sammy) never saw the "blue craft." they seemed to be 1000's of feet apart in the sky so there is no way they could have been one craft.  they were moving in a northeastern direction, and just seemed to glide through the air at a fast speed, if i were to estimate the speed, i would say it was 4 times faster than the speed regular planes travel through the sky when you watch them from the ground. the sighting lasted around ten seconds, and the crafts disappeared behind and over the right side of the house. i lost sight of the "blue craft" first and then the "red craft." i could see the "brilliant white craft" until its view got blocked by the house. after the sighting, we quickly started to try to make sense of what we saw. we discussed many possibilities of what they were but having no working knowledge of aerial vehicles whether gov't, weather related or alien, we have no idea what we witnessed. all i know is that when i saw what i saw, i felt a great sense of awe, that's the only feeling that can describe what i felt at the moment of the sighting.
content.summary: 3 crafts in v formation, red white and blue colored over houston, tx

content.detailedDescription:
1. in my back yard letting my dog out for the night.  
2. i was looking at some stars when an object at high altitude passed my field of vision.
3. at first though it was a plane, but seemed unusual and no engine noises.
4. it was traveling south in a straight line.  it seemed to be illuinated (glowing) did not have the normal distinct nagvigational lights of an aircraft.  sort of reddish and hazy.  possiby cross shaped but hard to discern. seemed to be traveling fast. (but not zipping by)
5. i wanted to get a longer look at it and it was unusual enough that i kept watching it to figure out what it was.  i live about 40 miles from kennedy airport & laguardia so i've seen many aircraft in the skies at night. this was definately unusual.
6. i lost sight as it passed over my trees and could not see it again.
content.summary: Noticed object in sky traveling south, possibly cross shaped, seemed to glow sort of fuzzy, sort of reddish

content.detailedDescription: This was the first of two events that i have witnessed in the same area, over a field beside my house in a housing estate in dublin. i was standing at he railings when something that looked like a football caught my eye. it looked as if it was a soccer ball that someone had kicked over the trees. but when i expected it to land on the other side of the trees, the side i was watching from, it just seemed to hold it's altitude and move across the field in front of me. i realised that it was really silver and shiny. i just stood and watched it, (we had not got a video camera at the time), until it floated away past the motorway and ought of sight. i have told some people about the incident, but i don't think they elieved me. i hope you will.
content.summary: Looked like a soccer ball at first, rose from behind some trees. but it didn't  fall again it just began to move slowly across the field until it dissapeared over in the direction of the highway.
